name: Calltrunk
tag_list: call-recording, communications, mobile, pbx, sip, london
overview:
Calltrunk works on any device. Users can make calls with landlines, Skype, iPhone,Android, BlackBerry, Windows7 or Symbian phones.

Or they can launch a call through a Mac Address book or via CRM solutions. Recordings are accessed via mobile or online.

Attach notes to recordings, download them, email them or order transcriptions. Share recordings with Evernote, Box, Dropbox, SugarCRM and more.

Search your conversations for important information. Calltrunk’s ArgoSearch enables you to instantly search all your recordings for the words spoken, the notes you made, the transcripts you may have ordered, the date of the call or even the type of call.
